Header.title: Welcome to Multitech Tools
Header.paragraph: We are one of the reputed tool manufacturers providing a large selection of HSS cutting tool, Carbide Cutting tools, Solid Carbide tools, CNC & VMC Machining Valve Components

About.paragraph: Multi Tech Tools (ISO 9001-2008) started in the year 1995 by Mr. M.Shakar CEO of Our company. We are one of the reputed tool manufacturers providing a large selection of HSS cutting tool, Carbide Cutting tools, Solid Carbide tools, CNC & VMC Machined Components. Multi Tech Tools has committed to manufacturing the highest quality carbide cutting tools, Machining Components possible, offering competitive prices and providing best customer service. Our tools do the job better, faster and lower of overall production costs with Good Quality.
About.paragraph1: We have very good setup in quality team to inspect every stage of production. We extended our concept of focus of specialization to our precision machining works through VMCs and CNCs aswell in all the materials of construction. Such combined manufacture of quality tools and the Machining works results in gradually increased efficiency and our productivity. We have very good track record in manufacture and supply within the scheduled time.
About.paragraph2: In Multi Tech Tools, we have well trained and experienced work force team and this allows in the unique geometries of the tools they produce. Our customers gain the expertise and enthusiasm of a responsive team that is committed to doing one thing-and doing it best.
Why: Continuous effort to extend tool life, reduce chatter, cut cycle times, and improve part quality - even at extreme parameters
Specialists in extreme and demanding product applications
Experienced Marketing Executives who work to optimize a tool for your particular application
